sentences.sentence: Aaron Carter said Michael taught him the Moonwalk in 2003.
sentences.translation: 亚伦·卡特说迈克尔在2003年教他太空步。

sentences.sentence: I don't think he'll be able to Moonwalk his way out this time.
sentences.translation: 我不认为他这次能够用月球漫步的方式脱身。

sentences.sentence: Neil Armstrong poses in the Lunar Module after his historic moonwalk.
sentences.translation: 阿姆斯特朗在他历史性的“月球漫步”之后回到登月舱中拍摄的照片。
